summary: Place Clones* wherever you want through Skyrim ...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Armies of Clones[/size][/b][/color] (No DLC needed for the [color=#00ff00]version 2.0[/color]; 3 DLCs required for the [color=#00ff00]version 2.2[/color])

[b][i]Place 74 Clones* wherever you want through Skyrim ...[/i][/b]

Some of these clones are [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Unused_NPCs] unused NPCs [/url], none of these NPCs are present in the game ! (Benkum, Brond, Headsman, Huki Seven-Swords, Liesl, Malacath, Makhel Abbas, Captain Metilius)

+ New NPCs: Tali (Khajiit), Kara (Nord), Rika (Khajiit), Dar’Khat-Do (Khajiit)

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18031003283916616015606462.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/03/10//18031003283916616015606462.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create armies of clones* (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these clones*, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00]Whiterun [/color] (Merchants: [i] Belethor at the Belethor's General Goods, Elrindir at the Drunken Huntsman, Carlotta[/i]) Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into clones ... The clones are following you.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/xqV02IK.gif[/img]

*List of Clones :

[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18032007210716616015623103.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/03/20//18032007210716616015623103.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#ff0000][b][size=5] CREDITS [/size][/b][/color]


[color=#ff0000]Tedix[/color] for « Dar'Khat-Do » in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12399/?]Dar'Khat-Do [/url] (Merci encore Tedix !)

[color=#ff0000]MoRZiLLo and Renamon[/color] for « Rika », « Tali », in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51573/?] Khajit Female Marriage [/url] (« You can use at your own MOD or whatever you create without my permission.It's totally Free »)

[color=#ff0000] Flatline42[/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16296/?] FC Kara the Pathfinder [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”)

[color=#ff0000] Mihail Romanov[/color] for the Classic Ghosts in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90213/] Classic Ghosts - Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- oblivion- undead) [/url]
